categories: Category:Star Wars: Episode IX The Rise of Skywalker actors

nodes.text: Joe Hewetson (born in 1999) is an actor who portrays a Resistance officer in the 2019 film Star Wars: Episode IX The Rise of Skywalker. He is the son of Nina Gold, UK Casting Director for the Star Wars films The Force Awakens, The Last Jedi, Solo: A Star Wars Story and The Rise of Skywalker; and Greenpeace activist Frank Hewetson.
